column4: Number of incidents per bias motivation

column1: 1 Population figures are published only for the cities. The figures listed for the universities and colleges are student enrollment and were provided by the United States Department of Education for the 2016 school year, the most recent available. The enrollment figures include full-time and part-time students.
2 Includes one incident reported with more than one bias motivation.
3 Student enrollment figures were not available.
